Query the latest exchange rates between different currencies.

parameters.description: The amount of the base currency you want to convert
parameters.name: base_amount

parameters.name: base_currency

parameters.description: The currency code of the target currency that you want to convert to

balance.description: The current balance of the wallet

currency.description: The currency associated with the wallet

in_transit_balance.description: The amount of the balance that is in transit

locked_balance.description: The amount of the balance that is locked

amount.description: The amount of currency to be transferred

currency.description: The code of currency to be transferred

from.description: The ID of the wallet from which the transfer will be made

to.description: The ID of the wallet to which the transfer will be made

amount.description: The amount of currency to be withdrawn

currency.description: The code of currency to be withdrawn.

network.description: The network of the currency to be withdrawn.

toAddress.description: The recipient address where the withdrawn funds will be sent. This is usually a wallet address specific to the chosen network.

walletId.description: The ID of the wallet from which the withdrawal will be made.

can_transfer.description: Is it transferable within the platform

contract_address.description: Contract address (for token contracts, if applicable)

need_memo.description: Does it require a memo/note for transactions

precision.description: The number of decimals used by the currency

can_deposit.description: Indicates if on-chain deposits are allowed

can_transfer.description: Indicates if internal transfers are permitted

can_withdraw.description: Indicates if on-chain withdrawals are allowed

contract_address.description: Contract address for tokens based on smart contracts, such as ERC-20

max_fee_for_ct_addr.description: Maximum transaction fee for contract addresses

max_withdraw_amount.description: Maximum amount for a single on-chain withdrawal

min_collect_amount.description: Minimum amount for collection, i.e., the minimum amount to aggregate small balances to a single address

min_confirmations.description: Minimum number of confirmations required, indicating the number of block confirmations needed for a transaction to be considered valid

min_deposit_amount.description: Minimum amount for a single deposit

min_fee_for_ct_addr.description: Minimum transaction fee for contract addresses

min_withdraw_amount.description: Minimum amount for a single on-chain withdrawal

name.description: Name of the currency, e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.

need_memo.description: Indicates if additional Memo information is required, as needed by some currencies or exchanges

network.description: Associated network, e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.

base_currency.description: The currency to be converted from

to_currency.description: The currency to be converted to.

base_amount.description: The amount of the base currency you want to convert

base_currency.description: The currency code of the base currency that you want to convert from

rate.description: The exchange rate from the base currency to the target currency

to_amount.description: The amount of the target currency you will receive after the conversion

to_currency.description: The currency code of the target currency that you want to convert to

rate.description: The exchange rate between the `BaseCurrency` and `ToCurrency`

amount.description: The total amount of money involved in the transaction.

avatar.description: A URL or path to an avatar image associated with the transaction, often used to visually represent the transaction's source or recipient.

created_at.description: The date and time when the transaction was created.

currency.description: The code of currency used in the transaction (e.g., TON, USDT, USD, EUR, etc.).

direction.description: Indicates the flow of the transaction, typically whether it is incoming or outgoing.

gateway.description: The payment gateway or platform used to process the transaction.

id.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

status.description: The current status of the transaction.
